Sorry, but since the ridicule of last night, all I am  going to send for 
n=
ow on are raw files, without conversations in them.   People get up in arms=
 
when they don't understand the possibilities  I  guess.  It's so ironic w=
hen 
a few got upset last year about someone making  money off a box and ch=
arging 
the public, because this person knew or could  hear what spirit wer=
e 
saying, and they could not so they had a fit.  And  this year same perso=
n is now 
better in their eyes.  And here I  am referring many of my own ct=
's. to join 
these 3 lists, and risking  my own validity as a  spiritualist=
 psychic, just 
because I  am able to understand what a few cannot, and  pr=
etty much the 
same  people,  are  up  in arms all over again.  I am not go=
ing to  refer any 
more of my ct's  to join these lists anymore because of =
 last nights 
ridicule.  It made me feel terrible. sf
 
 
 
In a message da=
ted 10/10/2010 11:51:41 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
no_reply@yahoogroups.=
com writes: 

 
 
 
I'm thrilled you can hear this, Snow! These singing fil=
es are the pits for  
most people to understand. I'm looking forward to hea=
ring your files on  
youtube, after I get the settings straightened out on =
my pc. I'm running with  
add-ons disabled, to try to make it run faster, a=
nd I can't play certain  
things right now. Please keep your files coming, =
as well as telling us about  
your conversations with David and the other s=
ide.
